select.name: country_id
select.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

option.t-att-selected: country.id == int(country_id) if country_id else country.id == partner.country_id.id if partner else country.code == 'IN' if country.code else null

select.name: state_id
select.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

option.t-att-selected: state.id == int(state_id) if state_id else state.id == partner.state_id.id if partner else null

input.name: assembly_constituency
input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

input.name: house_number
input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

input.name: locality
input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

input.name: town
input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

input.name: post_office
input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

input.name: zip
input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

input.name: district
input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.change_voter_id_address == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

select.name: birth_country_id
select.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and 'required' or None

option.t-att-selected: birth_country.id == int(birth_country_id) if birth_country_id else birth_country.id == partner.birth_country_id.id if partner else birth_country.code == 'IN' if birth_country.code else null

select.name: birth_state_id
select.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and (len(states) >= 1) and 'required' or None

option.t-att-selected: birth_state.id == int(birth_state_id) if birth_state_id else birth_state.id == partner.birth_state_id.id if partner else null

div.t-attf-class: col-lg-12 row form-group s_website_form_field birth_state_textfield_div #{not partner and 'd-none' or ''} #{(partner and partner.birth_country_id.name != 'India') and 'd-none' or ''}

input.name: birth_state_textfield
input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and 'required' or None

input.name: birth_district
input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and 'required' or None

div.label: If already applied for Kanha voter ID, please provide application reference number

select.name: already_have_kanha_voter_id
select.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and 'required' or None

option.t-att-selected: have_kanha_voter_id == already_have_kanha_voter_id if already_have_kanha_voter_id else have_kanha_voter_id == partner.already_have_kanha_voter_id if partner else null

div.t-attf-class: col-lg-12 row form-group s_website_form_field change_voter_id_address #{not partner and 'd-none' or ''} #{(partner and partner.already_have_kanha_voter_id != 'Yes') and 'd-none' or ''}

div.label: Do you want to change your Voter Id card Address to Kanha?

option.t-att-selected: change_address == change_voter_id_address if change_voter_id_address else change_address == partner.change_voter_id_address if partner else null

div.t-attf-class: col-lg-12 row form-group s_website_form_field kanha_voter_id_number #{not partner and 'd-none' or ''} #{(partner and partner.already_have_kanha_voter_id != 'Yes') and 'd-none' or ''}

input.name: kanha_voter_id_number
input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.already_have_kanha_voter_id == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

div.t-attf-class: col-lg-12 row form-group s_website_form_field kanha_voter_id_image #{not partner and 'd-none' or ''} #{(partner and partner.already_have_kanha_voter_id != 'Yes') and 'd-none' or ''}

t.t-if: partner and partner.kanha_voter_id_image and partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']

t.t-elif: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and not (partner and partner.kanha_voter_id_image)

div.t-attf-class: col-lg-12 row form-group s_website_form_field kanha_voter_id_back_image #{not partner and 'd-none' or ''} #{(partner and partner.already_have_kanha_voter_id != 'Yes') and 'd-none' or ''}

t.t-if: partner and partner.kanha_voter_id_back_image and partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']

t.t-elif: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and not (partner and partner.kanha_voter_id_back_image)

div.t-attf-class: col-lg-12 row form-group s_website_form_field need_new_kanha_voter_id #{not partner and 'd-none' or ''} #{(partner and partner.already_have_kanha_voter_id != 'No') and 'd-none' or ''}

select.name: need_new_kanha_voter_id
select.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.already_have_kanha_voter_id == 'No' and 'required' or None

option.t-att-selected: new_kanha_voter == need_new_kanha_voter_id if need_new_kanha_voter_id else new_kanha_voter == partner.need_new_kanha_voter_id if partner else null

div.t-attf-class: col-lg-12 row form-group s_website_form_field voter_application_type #{not partner and 'd-none' or ''} #{((partner and partner.need_new_kanha_voter_id != 'Yes') and (partner and partner.change_voter_id_address != 'Yes')) and 'd-none' or ''}

select.name: application_type
select.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.need_new_kanha_voter_id == 'Yes' and 'required' or None

option.t-att-selected: partner.application_type if partner else null
relation == relation_type if relation_type else relation == partner.relation_type if partner else null

input.t-att-required: (not partner or partner.application_status in ['draft', 'to_approve', 'approved_for_edit']) and partner and partner.relation_type == 'Other' and 'required' or None

input.name: passport_front_image_filename
input.t-att-required: None if partner and partner.citizenship != 'Overseas' else 'true'

input.name: indian_visa_filename
input.t-att-required: None if partner and partner.citizenship != 'Overseas' else 'true'

option.t-att-selected: profile.id == int(work_profile_id) if work_profile_id else profile.id == partner.work_profile_id.id if partner else null

div.t-attf-class: col-lg-12 row form-group s_website_form_field employee_id #{not partner and 'd-none' or ''} #{(partner and partner.work_profile_id.name == 'Resident') and 'd-none' or ''}
col-lg-12 row form-group s_website_form_field department #{not partner and 'd-none' or ''} #{(partner and partner.work_profile_id.name == 'Resident') and 'd-none' or ''}

option.t-att-selected: department.id == int(department_id) if department_id else department.id == partner.department_id.id if partner else null
kanha_location.id == int(kanha_location_id) if kanha_location_id else kanha_location.id == partner.kanha_location_id.id if partner else null
